  279: -define(NIST2, "2.16.840.1.101.3.2.1.48.2").
  280: -define(NIST3, "2.16.840.1.101.3.2.1.48.3").
  281: -define(NIST4, "2.16.840.1.101.3.2.1.48.4").
  282: -define(NIST5, "2.16.840.1.101.3.2.1.48.5").

  286: -define(NIST2_OID, {2,16,840,1,101,3,2,1,48,2}).
  287: -define(NIST3_OID, {2,16,840,1,101,3,2,1,48,3}).

  298: -record(verify_state, {
  299:                        crls,

  301:                        revoke_state}).
  302: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  303: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
  304: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  305: 
  306: suite() ->
  307:     [].
  308: 
  309: all() ->
  310:     [{group, signature_verification},
  311:      {group, validity_periods},
  312:      {group, verifying_name_chaining},
  313:      {group, verifying_paths_with_self_issued_certificates},
  314:      {group, basic_certificate_revocation_tests},
  315:      {group, delta_crls},
  316:      {group, distribution_points},
  317:      {group, verifying_basic_constraints},
  318:      {group, key_usage},
  319:      {group, name_constraints},
  320:      {group, private_certificate_extensions},
  321:      {group, policies},
  322:      {group, require_explicit_policy},
  323:      {group, policy_mappings},
  324:      {group, inhibit_policy_mapping},
  325:      {group, inhibit_any_policy}
  326:     ].
  327: 
  328: groups() ->
  329:     [{signature_verification, [], [valid_rsa_signature,
  330: 				   invalid_rsa_signature, valid_dsa_signature,
  331: 				   invalid_dsa_signature]},
  332:      {validity_periods, [],
  333:       [not_before_invalid, not_before_valid, not_after_invalid, not_after_valid]},
  334:      {verifying_name_chaining, [],
  335:       [invalid_name_chain, whitespace_name_chain, capitalization_name_chain,
  336:        uid_name_chain, attrib_name_chain, string_name_chain]},
  337:      {verifying_paths_with_self_issued_certificates, [],
  338:       [basic_valid, basic_invalid, crl_signing_valid, crl_signing_invalid]},
  339:      {basic_certificate_revocation_tests, [],
  340:       [missing_CRL,
  341:        revoked_CA,
  342:        revoked_peer,
  343:        invalid_CRL_signature,
  344:        invalid_CRL_issuer, invalid_CRL, valid_CRL,
  345:        unknown_CRL_extension, old_CRL, fresh_CRL, valid_serial,
  346:        invalid_serial, valid_seperate_keys, invalid_separate_keys]},
  347:      {delta_crls, [], [delta_without_crl, valid_delta_crls, invalid_delta_crls]},
  348:      {distribution_points, [], [valid_distribution_points,
  349: 				valid_distribution_points_no_issuing_distribution_point,
  350: 				invalid_distribution_points, valid_only_contains,
  351: 				invalid_only_contains, valid_only_some_reasons,
  352: 				invalid_only_some_reasons, valid_indirect_crl,
  353: 				invalid_indirect_crl, valid_crl_issuer, invalid_crl_issuer]},
  354:      {verifying_basic_constraints,[],
  355:       [missing_basic_constraints, valid_basic_constraint, invalid_path_constraints,
  356:        valid_path_constraints]},
  357:      {key_usage, [],
  358:       [invalid_key_usage, valid_key_usage]},
  359:      {name_constraints, [],
  360:       [valid_DN_name_constraints, invalid_DN_name_constraints,
  361:        valid_rfc822_name_constraints,
  362:        invalid_rfc822_name_constraints, valid_DN_and_rfc822_name_constraints,
  363:        invalid_DN_and_rfc822_name_constraints, valid_dns_name_constraints,
  364:        invalid_dns_name_constraints, valid_uri_name_constraints,
  365:        invalid_uri_name_constraints]},
  366:      {private_certificate_extensions, [],
  367:       [unknown_critical_extension, unknown_not_critical_extension]},
  368:      {policies, [], [certificate_all_same_policy,
  369:                      certificate_no_policies,
  370:                      certificate_different_policies_first_ca,
  371:                      certificate_different_policies_end_entity,
  372:                      certificate_different_policies_second_ca,
  373:                      certificate_overlapping_policies,
  374:                      certificate_different_policies_no_overlapp_7,
  375:                      certificate_different_policies_no_overlapp_8,
  376:                      certificate_different_policies_no_overlapp_9,
  377:                      certificate_all_same_policies,
  378:                      certificate_all_any_policy,
  379:                      certificate_different_policies,
  380:                      certificate_all_same_policies_13,
  381:                      certificate_any_policy,
  382:                      certificate_user_notice_qualifier_15,
  383:                      certificate_user_notice_qualifier_16,
  384:                      certificate_user_notice_qualifier_17,
  385:                      certificate_user_notice_qualifier_18,
  386:                      certificate_user_notice_qualifier_19,
  387:                      certificate_cps_pointer_qualifier
  388:                     ]},
  389:      {require_explicit_policy, [],
  390:       [
  391:        require_explicit_valid_empty,
  392:        require_explicit_valid,
  393:        require_explicit_invalid,
  394:        require_explicit_valid_selfissued,
  395:        require_explicit_invalid_selfissued
  396:       ]},
  397:      {policy_mappings, [],
  398:       [
  399:        valid_policy_mapping,
  400:        invalid_policy_mapping_2,
  401:        valid_policy_mapping_3,
  402:        invalid_policy_mapping_4,
  403:        valid_policy_mapping_5,
  404:        valid_policy_mapping_6,
  405:        invalid_policy_mapping_7,
  406:        invalid_policy_mapping_8,
  407:        valid_policy_mapping_9,
  408:        invalid_policy_mapping_10,
  409:        valid_policy_mapping_11,
  410:        valid_policy_mapping_12,
  411:        valid_policy_mapping_13,
  412:        valid_policy_mapping_14
  413:       ]},
  414:      {inhibit_policy_mapping, [],
  415:       [
  416:        inhibit_mapping_invalid,
  417:        inhibit_mapping_valid,
  418:        inhibit_mapping_valid_selfissued,
  419:        inhibit_mapping_invalid_selfissued
  420:       ]},
  421:      {inhibit_any_policy, [],
  422:       [
  423:        inhibit_any_invalid_empty,
  424:        inhibit_any_valid,
  425:        inhibit_any_invalid,
  426:        inhibit_any_valid_selfissued,
  427:        inhibit_any_invalid_selfissued
  428:       ]}
  429:     ].
  430: 
  431: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  432: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  433:     application:stop(crypto),
  434:     try application:start(crypto) of
  435: 	ok ->
  436: 	    application:start(asn1),
  437: 	    crypto_support_check(Config)
  438:     catch _:_ ->
  439: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  440:     end.
  441: 
  442: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  443:     application:stop(asn1),
  444:     application:stop(crypto).
  445: 
  446: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  447: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  448:     Config.
  449: 
  450: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  451:     Config.
  452: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  453: init_per_testcase(_Func, Config) ->
  454:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  455:     put(datadir, Datadir),
  456:     Config.
  457: 
  458: end_per_testcase(_Func, Config) ->
  459:     Config.
  460: 
  461: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  462: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  463: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  464: 
  465: %%--------------------------- signature_verification--------------------------------------------------
  466: valid_rsa_signature() ->
  467:     [{doc, "Test rsa signature verification"}].
  468: valid_rsa_signature(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  469:     run([{ "4.1.1", "Valid Certificate Path Test1 EE", ok}]).
  470: 
  471: invalid_rsa_signature() ->
  472:     [{doc,"Test rsa signature verification"}].
  473: invalid_rsa_signature(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  474:     run([{ "4.1.2", "Invalid CA Signature Test2 EE", {bad_cert,invalid_signature}},
  475: 	 { "4.1.3", "Invalid EE Signature Test3 EE", {bad_cert,invalid_signature}}]).
  476: 
  477: valid_dsa_signature() ->
  478:     [{doc,"Test dsa signature verification"}].
  479: valid_dsa_signature(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  480:     run([{ "4.1.4", "Valid DSA Signatures Test4 EE", ok},
  481: 	 { "4.1.5", "Valid DSA Parameter Inheritance Test5 EE", ok}]).
  482: 
  483: invalid_dsa_signature() ->
  484:     [{doc,"Test dsa signature verification"}].
  485: invalid_dsa_signature(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  486:     run([{ "4.1.6", "Invalid DSA Signature Test6 EE",{bad_cert,invalid_signature}}]).
  487: 
  488: %%-----------------------------validity_periods------------------------------------------------
  489: not_before_invalid() ->
  490:     [{doc,"Test valid periods"}].
  491: not_before_invalid(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  492:     run([{ "4.2.1", "Invalid CA notBefore Date Test1 EE",{bad_cert, cert_expired}},
  493: 	 { "4.2.2", "Invalid EE notBefore Date Test2 EE",{bad_cert, cert_expired}}]).
  494: 
  495: not_before_valid() ->
  496:     [{doc,"Test valid periods"}].
  497: not_before_valid(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  498:     run([{ "4.2.3", "Valid pre2000 UTC notBefore Date Test3 EE", ok},
  499:          { "4.2.4", "Valid GeneralizedTime notBefore Date Test4 EE", ok}]).
  500: 
  501: not_after_invalid() ->
  502:     [{doc,"Test valid periods"}].
  503: not_after_invalid(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  504:     run([{ "4.2.5", "Invalid CA notAfter Date Test5 EE", {bad_cert, cert_expired}},
  505: 	 { "4.2.6", "Invalid EE notAfter Date Test6 EE", {bad_cert, cert_expired}},
  506: 	 { "4.2.7", "Invalid pre2000 UTC EE notAfter Date Test7 EE",{bad_cert, cert_expired}}]).
  507:

  940: require_explicit_valid() ->
  941:     [{doc, "The path should validate successfully (as long as the initial-policy-set "
  942:       "is either any-policy or otherwise includes NIST-test-policy-1) since "
  943:       "the user-constrained-policy-set is not empty."}].
  944: require_explicit_valid(Config) when is_list(Config)->

 1048: invalid_policy_mapping_7() ->
 1049:     [{doc, "In this test, the intermediate certificate includes a policyMappings extension "
 1050:       "that includes a mapping in which the issuerDomainPolicy is anyPolicy. The intermediate "
 1051:       "certificate also includes a critical policyConstraints extension with requireExplicitPolicy "
 1052:       "set to 0. "}].

 1054:     run([{"4.10.7", "Invalid Mapping From anyPolicy Test7 EE",
 1055:           {bad_cert,
 1056:            {invalid_policy_mapping,
 1057:             #'PolicyMappings_SEQOF'{
 1058:                issuerDomainPolicy = ?anyPolicy,
 1059:                subjectDomainPolicy = oidify(?NIST1)
 1060:               }}}}
 1061:         ]).

 1063:     [{doc, "In this test, the intermediate certificate includes a policyMappings "

 1399:     [{doc,"CRL Distribution Point tests"}].
 1400: invalid_only_some_reasons(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1401:     run([{ "4.14.15", "Invalid onlySomeReasons Test15 EE",
 1402: 	   {bad_cert,{revoked, keyCompromise}}},
 1403: 	 { "4.14.16", "Invalid onlySomeReasons Test16 EE",
 1404: 	   {bad_cert,{revoked, certificateHold}}},
 1405: 	 { "4.14.17", "Invalid onlySomeReasons Test17 EE",
 1406: 	   {bad_cert, revocation_status_undetermined}},
 1407: 	 { "4.14.20", "Invalid onlySomeReasons Test20 EE",
 1408: 	   {bad_cert,{revoked, keyCompromise}}},
 1409: 	 { "4.14.21", "Invalid onlySomeReasons Test21 EE",
 1410: 	   {bad_cert,{revoked, affiliationChanged}}}
 1411: 	]).
 1412: 
 1413: valid_indirect_crl() ->
 1414:     [{doc,"CRL Distribution Point tests"}].
 1415: valid_indirect_crl(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1416:     run([{ "4.14.22", "Valid IDP with indirectCRL Test22 EE", ok},
 1417: 	 { "4.14.24", "Valid IDP with indirectCRL Test24 EE", ok},
 1418: 	 { "4.14.25", "Valid IDP with indirectCRL Test25 EE", ok}
 1419: 	]).
 1420: 
 1421: invalid_indirect_crl() ->
 1422:     [{doc,"CRL Distribution Point tests"}].
 1423: invalid_indirect_crl(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1424:     run([{ "4.14.23", "Invalid IDP with indirectCRL Test23 EE",
 1425: 	   {bad_cert,{revoked, keyCompromise}}},
 1426: 	 { "4.14.26", "Invalid IDP with indirectCRL Test26 EE",
 1427: 	   {bad_cert, revocation_status_undetermined}}
 1428: 	]).
 1429: 
 1430: valid_crl_issuer() ->
 1431:     [{doc,"CRL Distribution Point tests"}].
 1432: valid_crl_issuer(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1433:     run([{ "4.14.28", "Valid cRLIssuer Test28 EE", ok},
 1434: 	 { "4.14.29", "Valid cRLIssuer Test29 EE", ok},
 1435: 	 { "4.14.33", "Valid cRLIssuer Test33 EE", ok}
 1436: 	]).
 1437: 
 1438: invalid_crl_issuer() ->
 1439:     [{doc,"CRL Distribution Point tests"}].
 1440: invalid_crl_issuer(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1441:     run([
 1442: 	 { "4.14.27", "Invalid cRLIssuer Test27 EE", {bad_cert, revocation_status_undetermined}},
 1443: 	 { "4.14.31", "Invalid cRLIssuer Test31 EE", {bad_cert,{revoked, keyCompromise}}},
 1444: 	 { "4.14.32", "Invalid cRLIssuer Test32 EE", {bad_cert,{revoked, keyCompromise}}},
 1445: 	 { "4.14.34", "Invalid cRLIssuer Test34 EE", {bad_cert,{revoked, keyCompromise}}},
 1446: 	 { "4.14.35", "Invalid cRLIssuer Test35 EE", {bad_cert, revocation_status_undetermined}}
 1447: 	]).
 1448: 
 1449: %% Although this test is valid it has a circular dependency. As a result
 1450: %% an attempt is made to recursively checks a CRL path and rejected due to
 1451: %% a CRL path validation error. PKITS notes suggest this test does not
 1452: %% need to be run due to this issue.
 1453: %%	 { "4.14.30", "Valid cRLIssuer Test30", 54 }
 1454: 
 1455: 
 1456: %%-------------------------------private_certificate_extensions----------------------------------------------
 1457: 
 1458: unknown_critical_extension() ->
 1459:     [{doc,"Test that a cert with an unknown critical extension is recjected"}].
 1460: unknown_critical_extension(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1461:     run([{ "4.16.2",  "Invalid Unknown Critical Certificate Extension Test2 EE",
 1462: 	   {bad_cert,unknown_critical_extension}}]).
 1463: 
 1464: unknown_not_critical_extension() ->
 1465:     [{doc,"Test that a not critical unknown extension is ignored"}].
 1466: unknown_not_critical_extension(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1467:     run([{ "4.16.1",  "Valid Unknown Not Critical Certificate Extension Test1 EE", ok}]).
 1468: 
 1469: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1470: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 1471: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1472: 
 1473: -spec run([tuple()]) -> ok.
 1474: run(Tests) ->
 1475:     [TA] = read_certs("Trust Anchor Root Certificate"),
 1476:     run(Tests, TA).
 1477: 
 1478: -spec run([Entry] | Entry, TA) -> ok when
 1479:       TA :: public_key:pem_entry(),
 1480:       Entry :: {CA, Test, Result} | {CA, Test, Result, CertificateBodies},
 1481:       CA :: public_key:pem_entry(),
 1482:       Test :: string(),
 1483:       Result :: atom(),
 1484:       CertificateBodies :: [binary()].
 1485: run({Chap, Test, Result}, TA) ->
 1486:     run({Chap, Test, Result, read_certs(Test)}, TA);
 1487: run({Chap, Test, Result, CertsBody}, TA) ->
 1488:     TestStr = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("Running ~p ~p  ~n", [Chap, Test])),
 1489:     ct:log("~s", [TestStr]),
 1490:     CertChain = cas(Chap) ++ CertsBody,
 1491:     Options = path_validation_options(Chap),
 1492:     try public_key:pkix_path_validation(TA, CertChain, Options) of
 1493: 	{Result, {_, PolicySet}} ->
 1494:             true = validate_policy_set(Chap, PolicySet);
 1495: 	{error,Result} when Result =/= ok ->
 1496:             ok;
 1497: 	{error, Error}  ->
 1498: 	    ?error(" ~p ~p~n  Expected ~p got ~p ~n", [Chap, Test, Result, Error]),
 1499: 	    fail;
 1500: 	{ok, _OK} when Result =/= ok ->
 1501: 	    ?error(" ~p ~p~n  Expected ~p got ~p ~n", [Chap, Test, Result, _OK]),
 1502: 	    fail
 1503:     catch Type:Reason:Stack ->
 1504:             Str1 = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("Crash ~p:~p in ~p~n",[Type,Reason,Stack])),
 1505: 	    Str2 = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("   ~p ~p Expected ~p ~n", [Chap, Test, Result])),
 1506:             erlang:display(Str1),
 1507:             erlang:display(Str2),
 1508:             exit(crash)
 1509:     end;
 1510: 
 1511: run(Tests,TA) when is_list(Tests) ->
 1512:     lists:foreach(fun (T) -> run(T, TA) end, Tests),
 1513:     ok.
 1514: 
 1515: path_validation_options(Chap) ->
 1516:     Options = case needs_crl_options(Chap) of
 1517:                   true ->
 1518:                       crl_options(Chap);
 1519:                   false ->
 1520:                       Fun =
 1521:                           fun(_,{bad_cert, _} = Reason, _) ->
 1522:                                   {fail, Reason};
 1523:                              (_,{extension, _}, UserState) ->
 1524:                                   {unknown, UserState};
 1525:                              (_, Valid, UserState) when Valid == valid;
 1526:                                                         Valid == valid_peer ->
 1527:                                   {valid, UserState}
 1528:                           end,
 1529:                       [{verify_fun, {Fun, []}}]
 1530:               end,
 1531:     policy_options(Chap, Options).
 1532: 
 1533: -spec read_certs(TestCase :: string()) -> [CertificateContent :: binary()].
 1534: read_certs(Test) ->
 1535:     File = cert_file(Test),
 1536:     Ders = erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(File),
 1537:     extract_certificate(Ders).
 1538: 
 1539: -spec extract_certificate(Certificates :: [public_key:pem_entry()]) -> CertificateContent :: binary().
 1540: extract_certificate(Ders) ->
 1541:     [Cert || {'Certificate', Cert, not_encrypted} <- Ders].
 1542: 
 1543: read_crls(Test) ->
 1544:     File = crl_file(Test),
 1545:     Ders = erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(File),
 1546:     [CRL || {'CertificateList', CRL, not_encrypted} <- Ders].
 1547: 
 1548: -spec cert_file(TestCase :: string()) -> FilenamePath :: string().
 1549: cert_file(Test) ->
 1550:     file(?CONV, lists:append(string:tokens(Test, " -")) ++ ".pem").
 1551: 
 1552: -spec crl_file(TestCase :: string()) -> FilenamePath :: string().
 1553: crl_file(Test) ->
 1554:     file(?CRL, lists:append(string:tokens(Test, " -")) ++ ".pem").
 1555: 
 1556: -spec file(Subdir :: string(), Filename :: string()) -> FilenamePath :: string().
 1557: file(Sub,File) ->
 1558:     TestDir = case get(datadir) of
 1559: 		  undefined -> "./pkits_SUITE_data";
 1560: 		  Dir when is_list(Dir) ->
 1561: 		      Dir
 1562: 	      end,
 1563:     AbsFile = filename:join([TestDir,Sub,File]),
 1564:     case filelib:is_file(AbsFile) of
 1565: 	true -> ok;
 1566: 	false ->
 1567: 	    ?error("Couldn't read data from ~p ~n",[AbsFile])
 1568:     end,
 1569:     AbsFile.
 1570: 
 1571: error(Format, Args, File0, Line) ->
 1572:     File = filename:basename(File0),
 1573:     Pid = group_leader(),
 1574:     Pid ! {failed, File, Line},
 1575:     io:format(Pid, "~s(~p): ERROR"++Format, [File,Line|Args]).
 1576: 
 1577: warning(Format, Args, File0, Line) ->
 1578:     File = filename:basename(File0),
 1579:     io:format("~s(~p): Warning "++Format, [File,Line|Args]).
 1580: 
 1581: crypto_support_check(Config) ->
 1582:     CryptoSupport = crypto:supports(),
 1583:     Hashs = proplists:get_value(hashs, CryptoSupport),
 1584:     case proplists:get_bool(sha256, Hashs) of
 1585: 	true ->
 1586: 	    Config;
 1587: 	false ->
 1588: 	    {skip, "To old version of openssl"}
 1589:     end.
 1590: 
 1591: needs_crl_options("4.4" ++ _) ->
 1592:     true;
 1593: needs_crl_options("4.5" ++ _) ->
 1594:     true;
 1595: needs_crl_options("4.7.4" ++ _) ->
 1596:     true;
 1597: needs_crl_options("4.7.5" ++ _) ->
 1598:     true;
 1599: needs_crl_options("4.14" ++ _) ->
 1600:     true;
 1601: needs_crl_options("4.15" ++ _) ->
 1602:     true;
 1603: needs_crl_options(_) ->
 1604:     false.
 1605: 
 1606: crl_options(Chap) ->
 1607:     CRLNames = crl_names(Chap),
 1608:     CRLs = crls(CRLNames),
 1609:     Paths = lists:map(fun(CRLName) -> crl_path(CRLName) end, CRLNames),
 1610: 
 1611:     ct:log("Paths ~p ~n  Names ~p ~n", [Paths, CRLNames]),
 1612:     Fun =
 1613: 	fun(_,{bad_cert, _} = Reason, _) ->
 1614: 		{fail, Reason};
 1615: 	   (_,{extension,
 1616: 	       #'Extension'{extnID = ?'id-ce-cRLDistributionPoints',
 1617: 			    extnValue = Value}}, UserState0) ->
 1618: 		UserState = update_crls(Value, UserState0),
 1619: 		{valid, UserState};
 1620: 	   (_,{extension, _}, UserState) ->
 1621: 		{unknown, UserState};
 1622: 	   (OtpCert, Valid, UserState) when Valid == valid;
 1623: 					    Valid == valid_peer ->
 1624: 		DerCRLs = UserState#verify_state.crls,
 1625: 		Paths =  UserState#verify_state.crl_paths,
 1626: 		Crls = [{DerCRL, public_key:der_decode('CertificateList',
 1627: 						       DerCRL)} || DerCRL <- DerCRLs],
 1628: 
 1629: 		CRLInfo0 = crl_info(OtpCert, Crls, []),
 1630: 		CRLInfo = lists:reverse(CRLInfo0),
 1631: 		PathDb = crl_path_db(lists:reverse(Crls), Paths, []),
 1632: 
 1633: 		case CRLInfo of
 1634: 		    [] ->
 1635: 			{valid, UserState};
 1636: 		    [_|_] ->
 1637: 			case public_key:pkix_crls_validate(OtpCert, CRLInfo,
 1638: 							   [{issuer_fun,{fun trusted_cert_and_path/4, PathDb}}]) of
 1639: 			    valid ->
 1640: 				{valid, UserState};
 1641: 			    Reason  ->
 1642: 				{fail, Reason}
 1643: 			end
 1644: 		end
 1645: 	end,
 1646: 
 1647:     [{verify_fun, {Fun, #verify_state{crls = CRLs,
 1648: 				      crl_paths = Paths}}}].
 1649: 
 1650: crl_path_db([], [], Acc) ->
 1651:     Acc;
 1652: crl_path_db([{_, CRL} |CRLs], [Path | Paths], Acc) ->
 1653:     CertPath = lists:flatten(lists:map(fun([]) ->
 1654: 					       [];
 1655: 					  (CertFile) ->
 1656: 					       ct:log("Certfile ~p", [CertFile]),
 1657: 					       read_certs(CertFile)
 1658: 				       end, Path)),
 1659:     crl_path_db(CRLs, Paths, [{CRL, CertPath}| Acc]).
 1660: 
 1661: 
 1662: crl_info(_, [], Acc) ->
 1663:     Acc;
 1664: crl_info(OtpCert, [{_, #'CertificateList'{tbsCertList =
 1665:                                               #'TBSCertList'{issuer = Issuer,
 1666:                                                              crlExtensions = CRLExtensions}}}
 1667:                    = CRL | Rest], Acc) ->
 1668:     OtpTBSCert =  OtpCert#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
 1669:     Extensions = OtpTBSCert#'OTPTBSCertificate'.extensions,
 1670:     ExtList = pubkey_cert:extensions_list(CRLExtensions),
 1671:     DPs  = case pubkey_cert:select_extension(?'id-ce-cRLDistributionPoints', Extensions) of
 1672:                #'Extension'{extnValue = Value} ->
 1673: 		   lists:foldl(fun(Point, Acc0) ->
 1674: 				       Dp = pubkey_cert_records:transform(Point, decode),
 1675: 				       IDP = pubkey_cert:select_extension(?'id-ce-issuingDistributionPoint',
 1676: 									  Extensions),
 1677: 				       case Dp#'DistributionPoint'.cRLIssuer of
 1678: 					   asn1_NOVALUE ->
 1679: 					       [Dp | Acc0];
 1680: 					   DpCRLIssuer ->
 1681: 					       CRLIssuer = dp_crlissuer_to_issuer(DpCRLIssuer),
 1682: 					       CertIssuer =  OtpTBSCert#'OTPTBSCertificate'.issuer,
 1683: 					       case  pubkey_cert:is_issuer(CRLIssuer, CertIssuer) of
 1684: 						   true ->
 1685: 						       [Dp | Acc0];
 1686: 						   false when (IDP =/= undefined) ->
 1687: 						       Acc0;
 1688: 						   false ->
 1689: 						       [Dp | Acc0]
 1690: 					       end
 1691: 				       end
 1692: 			       end, [], Value);
 1693: 	       _ ->
 1694: 		   case same_issuer(OtpCert, Issuer) of
 1695: 		       true ->
 1696: 			   [make_dp(ExtList, asn1_NOVALUE, Issuer)];
 1697: 		       false ->
 1698: 			   [make_dp(ExtList, Issuer, ignore)]
 1699: 		   end
 1700: 	   end,
 1701:     DPsCRLs = lists:map(fun(DP) -> {DP, CRL} end, DPs),
 1702:     crl_info(OtpCert, Rest, DPsCRLs ++ Acc).
 1703: 
 1704: same_issuer(OTPCert, Issuer) ->
 1705:     DecIssuer = pubkey_cert_records:transform(Issuer, decode),
 1706:     OTPTBSCert =  OTPCert#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
 1707:     CertIssuer =  OTPTBSCert#'OTPTBSCertificate'.issuer,
 1708:     pubkey_cert:is_issuer(DecIssuer, CertIssuer).
 1709: 
 1710: make_dp(Extensions, Issuer0, DpInfo) ->
 1711:     {Issuer, Point} = mk_issuer_dp(Issuer0, DpInfo),
 1712:     case pubkey_cert:select_extension('id-ce-cRLReason', Extensions) of
 1713: 	#'Extension'{extnValue = Reasons} ->
 1714: 	    #'DistributionPoint'{cRLIssuer = Issuer,
 1715: 				 reasons = Reasons,
 1716: 				 distributionPoint = Point};
 1717: 	_ ->
 1718: 	    #'DistributionPoint'{cRLIssuer = Issuer,
 1719: 				 reasons = [unspecified, keyCompromise,
 1720: 					    cACompromise, affiliationChanged, superseded,
 1721: 					    cessationOfOperation, certificateHold,
 1722: 					    removeFromCRL, privilegeWithdrawn, aACompromise],
 1723: 				 distributionPoint = Point}
 1724:     end.
 1725: 
 1726: mk_issuer_dp(asn1_NOVALUE, Issuer) ->
 1727:     {asn1_NOVALUE, {fullName, [{directoryName, Issuer}]}};
 1728: mk_issuer_dp(Issuer, _) ->
 1729:     {[{directoryName, Issuer}], asn1_NOVALUE}.
 1730: 
 1731: update_crls(_, State) ->
 1732:     State.
 1733: 
 1734: trusted_cert_and_path(_, #'CertificateList'{} = CRL, _, PathDb) ->
 1735:     [TrustedDERCert] =  read_certs(crl_root_cert()),
 1736:     TrustedCert =  public_key:pkix_decode_cert(TrustedDERCert, otp),
 1737: 
 1738:     case lists:keysearch(CRL, 1, PathDb) of
 1739: 	{_, {CRL, [ _| _] = Path}} ->
 1740:             {ok, TrustedCert, [TrustedDERCert | Path]};
 1741: 	{_, {CRL, []}} ->
 1742: 	    {ok, TrustedCert, [TrustedDERCert]}
 1743:     end.
 1744: 
 1745: 
 1746: dp_crlissuer_to_issuer(DPCRLIssuer) ->
 1747:     [{directoryName, Issuer}] = pubkey_cert_records:transform(DPCRLIssuer, decode),
 1748:     Issuer.
 1749: 
 1750: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%% CA mappings %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1751: 
 1752: -spec cas(Chap :: string()) -> [Certificates :: public_key:pem_entry()].
 1753: cas(Chap) ->
 1754:     CAS = intermidiate_cas(Chap),
 1755:     lists:foldl(fun([], Acc) ->
 1756: 			Acc;
 1757: 		   (CA, Acc) ->
 1758: 			[CACert] = read_certs(CA),
 1759: 			[CACert | Acc]
 1760: 		end, [], CAS).
 1761: 
 1762: -spec intermidiate_cas(Chap :: string()) -> [CACert :: string()].
 1763: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.1.1";
 1764: 			    Chap == "4.1.3";
 1765: 			    Chap == "4.2.2";
 1766: 			    Chap == "4.2.3";
 1767: 			    Chap == "4.2.4";
 1768: 			    Chap == "4.2.6";
 1769: 			    Chap == "4.2.7";
 1770: 			    Chap == "4.2.8";
 1771: 			    Chap == "4.3.1";
 1772: 			    Chap == "4.3.3";
 1773: 			    Chap == "4.3.4";
 1774: 			    Chap == "4.3.5";
 1775: 			    Chap == "4.4.3";
 1776:                             Chap == "4.8.1.1";
 1777:                             Chap == "4.8.1.2";
 1778:                             Chap == "4.8.1.3";
 1779:                             Chap == "4.8.1.4";
 1780:                             Chap == "4.8.16";
 1781:                             Chap == "4.8.17";
 1782:                             Chap == "4.8.20"->
 1783:     ["Good CA Cert"];
 1784: 
 1785: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.1.2" ->
 1786:     ["Bad Signed CA Cert"];
 1787: 
 1788: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.1.4";
 1789: 			    Chap == "4.1.6" ->
 1790:     ["DSA CA Cert"];
 1791: 
 1792: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.1.5" ->
 1793:     ["DSA Parameters Inherited CA Cert", "DSA CA Cert"];
 1794: 
 1795: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.2.1";
 1796:                             Chap == "4.2.5" ->
 1797:     ["Bad notBefore Date CA Cert"];
 1798: 
 1799: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when  Chap == "4.16.1";
 1800:                              Chap == "4.16.2" ->
 1801:     ["Trust Anchor Root Certificate"];
 1802: 
 1803: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.3.2" ->
 1804:     ["Name Ordering CA Cert"];
 1805: 
 1806: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.13.34";
 1807: 			    Chap == "4.13.35" ->
 1808:     ["nameConstraints URI1 CA Cert"];
 1809: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.13.36";
 1810:                             Chap == "4.13.37" ->
 1811:     ["nameConstraints URI2 CA Cert"];
 1812: 
 1813: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.13.30";
 1814: 			    Chap == "4.13.31";
 1815: 			    Chap == "4.13.38"
 1816: 			    ->
 1817:     ["nameConstraints DNS1 CA Cert"];
 1818: 
 1819: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.13.32";
 1820:                             Chap == "4.13.33" ->
 1821:     ["nameConstraints DNS2 CA Cert"];
 1822: 
 1823: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.13.27";
 1824: 			    Chap == "4.13.28";
 1825: 			    Chap == "4.13.29" ->
 1826:     ["nameConstraints DN1 subCA3 Cert",
 1827:      "nameConstraints DN1 CA Cert"];
 1828: 
 1829: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.13.21";
 1830: 			    Chap == "4.13.22" ->
 1831:     ["nameConstraints RFC822 CA1 Cert"];
 1832: 
 1833: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.13.23";
 1834: 			    Chap == "4.13.24" ->
 1835:     ["nameConstraints RFC822 CA2 Cert"];
 1836: 
 1837: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.13.25";
 1838: 			    Chap == "4.13.26" ->
 1839:     ["nameConstraints RFC822 CA3 Cert"];
 1840: 
 1841: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.6.1" ->
 1842:     ["Missing basicConstraints CA Cert"];
 1843: 
 1844: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.6.2" ->
 1845:     ["basicConstraints Critical cA False CA Cert"];
 1846: 
 1847: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.6.3" ->
 1848:     ["basicConstraints Not Critical cA False CA Cert"];
 1849: 
 1850: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.5.1";
 1851: 			    Chap == "4.5.2" ->
 1852:     ["Basic Self-Issued New Key OldWithNew CA Cert", "Basic Self-Issued New Key CA Cert"];
 1853: 
 1854: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when	Chap == "4.5.3" ->
 1855:     ["Basic Self-Issued Old Key NewWithOld CA Cert", "Basic Self-Issued Old Key CA Cert"];
 1856: 
 1857: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.5.4";
 1858: 			    Chap == "4.5.5" ->
 1859:     ["Basic Self-Issued Old Key CA Cert"];
 1860: 
 1861: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.13.1";
 1862: 			    Chap == "4.13.2";
 1863: 			    Chap == "4.13.3";
 1864: 			    Chap == "4.13.4";
 1865: 			    Chap == "4.13.20"
 1866: 			    ->
 1867:     ["nameConstraints DN1 CA Cert"];
 1868: 
 1869: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.13.5" ->
 1870:     ["nameConstraints DN2 CA Cert"];
 1871: 
 1872: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.13.6";
 1873: 			    Chap == "4.13.7" ->
 1874:     ["nameConstraints DN3 CA Cert"];
 1875: 
 1876: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.13.8";
 1877: 			    Chap == "4.13.9" ->
 1878:     ["nameConstraints DN4 CA Cert"];
 1879: 
 1880: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.13.10";
 1881: 			    Chap == "4.13.11" ->
 1882:     ["nameConstraints DN5 CA Cert"];
 1883: 
 1884: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.13.12" ->
 1885:     ["nameConstraints DN1 subCA1 Cert",
 1886:      "nameConstraints DN1 CA Cert"];
 1887: 
 1888: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.13.13";
 1889: 			    Chap == "4.13.14" ->
 1890:     ["nameConstraints DN1 subCA2 Cert",
 1891:      "nameConstraints DN1 CA Cert"];
 1892: 
 1893: intermidiate_cas(Chap) when Chap == "4.13.15";
 1894: 			    Chap == "4.13.16" ->
 1895:     ["nameConstraints DN3 subCA1 Cert",

 2782: 
 2783: crl_path(CRL) ->
 2784:     L = length(CRL),
 2785:     Base = string:sub_string(CRL, 1, L -3),
 2786:     [Base ++ "Cert"].
 2787: 
 2788: crls(CRLS) ->
 2789:     lists:foldl(fun([], Acc) ->
 2790: 			Acc;
 2791: 		   (CRLFile, Acc) ->
 2792: 			[CRL] = read_crls(CRLFile),
 2793: 			[CRL | Acc]
 2794: 		end, [], CRLS).
 2795:

 2851:                                    Chap == "4.10.6.2" ->
 2852:     [{explicit_policy, true}, {policy_set, [?NIST6]} | Options];
 2853: policy_options(Chap, Options) when Chap == "4.10.1.3" ->
 2854:     [{explicit_policy, true}, {inhibit_policy_mapping, true} | Options];
 2855: policy_options(Chap, Options) when Chap == "4.10.2.2";
 2856:                                    Chap == "4.12.3.2" ->
 2857:     [{explicit_policy, true}, {inhibit_any_policy, true} | Options];
 2858: policy_options(Chap, Options) when  Chap == "4.10.10";
 2859:                                     Chap == "4.10.4";
 2860:                                     Chap == "4.12.4";
 2861:                                     Chap == "4.12.5";
 2862:                                     Chap == "4.12.8";
 2863:                                     Chap == "4.12.10";
 2864:                                     Chap == "4.11.1";
 2865:                                     Chap == "4.11.3";
 2866:                                     Chap == "4.11.5";
 2867:                                     Chap == "4.11.6";
 2868:                                     Chap == "4.11.8";
 2869:                                     Chap == "4.11.9";
 2870:                                     Chap == "4.11.10";
 2871:                                     Chap == "4.11.11" ->
 2872:     [{explicit_policy, true} | Options];
 2873: policy_options(_, Options) ->
 2874:     Options.
 2875: 
 2876: oidify(Oid) when is_tuple(Oid) ->
 2877:     Oid;
 2878: oidify(Oid) when  is_list(Oid) ->
 2879:     Tokens = string:tokens(Oid, "$."),
 2880:     OidList = [list_to_integer(StrInt) || StrInt <- Tokens],
 2881:     list_to_tuple(OidList).
 2882: 
 2883: validate_policy_set(Chap, Set) when Chap == "4.8.1.1";
 2884:                                     Chap == "4.8.1.2";
 2885:                                     Chap == "4.8.1.4";
 2886:                                     Chap == "4.8.6.1";
 2887:                                     Chap == "4.8.6.2";
 2888:                                     Chap == "4.12.7";
 2889:                                     Chap == "4.8.10.2";
 2890:                                     Chap == "4.8.13.1";
 2891:                                     Chap == "4.8.11.2";
 2892:                                     Chap == "4.8.14.1";
 2893:                                     Chap == "4.9.1";
 2894:                                     Chap == "4.9.2";
 2895:                                     Chap == "4.9.4";
 2896:                                     Chap == "4.9.6";
 2897:                                     Chap == "4.10.9";
 2898:                                     Chap == "4.10.11";
 2899:                                     Chap == "4.11.2";
 2900:                                     Chap == "4.11.7";
 2901:                                     Chap == "4.12.2";
 2902:                                     Chap == "4.12.3.1";
 2903:                                     Chap == "4.12.7" ->
 2904:     validate_nodes([[{expected_policy_set,[?NIST1_OID]},
 2905:                      {valid_policy, ?NIST1_OID}]], Set);
 2906: 
 2907: validate_policy_set(Chap, []) when Chap == "4.8.2.1";
 2908:                                    Chap == "4.8.3.1"->
 2909:     true;
 2910: validate_policy_set(Chap, Set) when Chap == "4.8.10.1" ->
 2911:     validate_nodes([[{expected_policy_set,[?NIST1_OID]},
 2912:                      {valid_policy, ?NIST1_OID}],
 2913:                     [{expected_policy_set,[?NIST2_OID]},
 2914:                      {valid_policy, ?NIST2_OID}]
 2915:                    ], Set);
 2916: validate_policy_set(Chap, Set) when Chap == "4.8.10.3";
 2917:                                     Chap == "4.8.13.2";
 2918:                                     Chap == "4.10.3.2";
 2919:                                     Chap == "4.11.4" ->
 2920:     validate_nodes([[{expected_policy_set,[?NIST2_OID]},
 2921:                      {valid_policy, ?NIST2_OID}]], Set);
 2922: validate_policy_set(Chap, Set) when Chap == "4.8.13.3" ->
 2923:     validate_nodes([[{expected_policy_set,[?NIST3_OID]},
 2924:                      {valid_policy, ?NIST3_OID}]], Set);
 2925: validate_policy_set("4.8.11.1", Set) ->
 2926:     validate_nodes([[{expected_policy_set,[?anyPolicy]},
 2927:                      {valid_policy, ?anyPolicy}]], Set);
 2928: validate_policy_set(Chap, Set) when Chap == "4.8.15";
 2929:                                     Chap == "4.8.16";
 2930:                                     Chap == "4.8.17";
 2931:                                     Chap == "4.8.19";
 2932:                                     Chap == "4.8.18.1";
 2933:                                     Chap == "4.8.20" ->
 2934:     validate_nodes([[{expected_policy_set,[?NIST1_OID]},
 2935:                      {valid_policy, ?NIST1_OID}]], Set),
 2936:     validate_qualifiers(Chap, Set);
 2937: validate_policy_set(Chap, Set) when Chap == "4.10.1.1" ->
 2938:     validate_nodes([[{expected_policy_set,[?NIST2_OID]},
 2939:                      {valid_policy, ?NIST1_OID}]], Set);
 2940: validate_policy_set(Chap, Set) when Chap == "4.10.5.1";
 2941:                                     Chap == "4.10.6.1" ->
 2942:     validate_nodes([[{expected_policy_set,[?NIST2_OID, ?NIST3_OID, ?NIST4_OID]},
 2943:                      {valid_policy, ?NIST1_OID}]], Set);
 2944: validate_policy_set(Chap, Set) when Chap == "4.10.12.1" ->
 2945:     true = validate_nodes([[{expected_policy_set,[?NIST3_OID]},
 2946:                             {valid_policy, ?NIST1_OID}]
 2947:                           ], Set),
 2948:     validate_qualifiers(Chap, Set);
 2949: validate_policy_set(Chap, Set) when Chap == "4.8.18.2";
 2950:                                     Chap == "4.10.12.2" ->
 2951:     true = validate_nodes([[{expected_policy_set,[?NIST2_OID]},
 2952:                             {valid_policy, ?NIST2_OID}]
 2953:                           ], Set),
 2954:     validate_qualifiers(Chap, Set);
 2955: validate_policy_set(Chap, Set) when Chap == "4.10.13" ->
 2956:     true = validate_nodes([[{expected_policy_set,[?NIST2_OID]},
 2957:                             {valid_policy, ?NIST1_OID}],
 2958:                            [{expected_policy_set,[?NIST2_OID]},
 2959:                             {valid_policy, ?NIST2_OID}]
 2960:                           ], Set),
 2961:     validate_qualifiers(Chap, Set);
 2962: validate_policy_set(Chap, Set) when Chap == "4.10.14" ->
 2963:     true = validate_nodes([[{expected_policy_set,[?NIST1_OID]},
 2964:                             {valid_policy, ?NIST1_OID}]
 2965:                           ], Set),
 2966:     validate_qualifiers(Chap, Set);
 2967: validate_policy_set(_Chap, _Set) ->
 2968:     true.
 2969: 
 2970: validate_nodes([], []) ->
 2971:     true;
 2972: validate_nodes([], _) ->
 2973:     false;
 2974: validate_nodes([Expected | Rest], Nodes) ->
 2975:     Remaining  = lists:filtermap(fun(Node) -> 
 2976:                                          not validate_node(Expected, Node)
 2977:                                  end, Nodes),
 2978:     validate_nodes(Rest, Remaining).
 2979: 
 2980: validate_node([{Key, Value}], Node) ->
 2981:     case maps:get(Key, Node) of
 2982:         Value ->
 2983:             true;
 2984:         _ ->
 2985:            false
 2986:     end;
 2987: validate_node([{Key, Value}| Rest], Node) ->
 2988:     case maps:get(Key, Node) of
 2989:         Value ->
 2990:             validate_node(Rest, Node);
 2991:         _ ->
 2992:            false
 2993:     end.
 2994: 
 2995: validate_qualifiers("4.8.15", [#{qualifier_set := QSet}]) ->
 2996:     ct:log("QS ~p", [QSet]),
 2997:     true = [#'UserNotice'{explicitText =
 2998:                               {visibleString,
 2999:                                "q1:  This is the user notice from qualifier 1.  "
 3000:                                "This certificate is for test purposes only"}}] == QSet;
 3001: validate_qualifiers("4.8.16", [#{qualifier_set := QSet}]) ->
 3002:     ct:log("~p", [QSet]),
 3003:     true = [#'UserNotice'{explicitText =
 3004:                        {visibleString,
 3005:                         "q1:  This is the user notice from qualifier 1.  "
 3006:                         "This certificate is for test purposes only"}}] == QSet;
 3007: validate_qualifiers("4.8.17", [#{qualifier_set := QSet}]) ->
 3008:     ct:log("~p", [QSet]),
 3009:     true = [#'UserNotice'{explicitText =
 3010:                               {visibleString,
 3011:                                "q3:  This is the user notice from qualifier 3.  "
 3012:                         "This certificate is for test purposes only"}}] == QSet;
 3013: validate_qualifiers("4.8.18.1",[#{qualifier_set := QSet}]) ->
 3014:     ct:log("QS ~p", [QSet]),
 3015:     true =  [#'UserNotice'{explicitText =
 3016:                                {visibleString,
 3017:                                 "q4:  This is the user notice from qualifier 4 associated "
 3018:                                 "with NIST-test-policy-1.  "
 3019:                                 "This certificate is for test purposes only"}}] == QSet;
 3020: validate_qualifiers("4.8.18.2", [#{qualifier_set := QSet}]) ->
 3021:     ct:log("QS ~p", [QSet]),
 3022:     true = [#'UserNotice'{explicitText =
 3023:                               {visibleString,
 3024:                                "q5:  This is the user notice from qualifier 5 associated"
 3025:                                " with anyPolicy.  This user notice should be associated "
 3026:                                "with NIST-test-policy-2" }}] == QSet;
 3027: validate_qualifiers("4.8.19", [#{qualifier_set := QSet}]) ->
 3028:     ct:log("QS ~p", [QSet]),
 3029:     true = [#'UserNotice'{explicitText = 
 3030:                               {visibleString, "q6:  Section 4.2.1.5 of RFC 3280 states the maximum size of "
 3031:                                "explicitText is 200 characters, but warns that some non-conforming CAs "
 3032:                                "exceed this limit.  Thus RFC 3280 states that certificate users SHOULD "
 3033:                                "gracefully handle explicitText with more than 200 characters.  This "
 3034:                                "explicitText is over 200 characters long"
 3035:                               }}] == QSet;
 3036: validate_qualifiers("4.8.20",  [#{qualifier_set := QSet}]) ->
 3037:     ct:log("QS ~p", [QSet]),
 3038:     true = [{uri, "http://csrc.nist.gov/groups/ST/crypto_apps_infra/csor/pki_registration.html#PKITest"}] 
 3039:         == QSet;
 3040:

 3043:     true = [#'UserNotice'{explicitText =
 3044:                               {visibleString, "q7:  This is the user notice from qualifier 7"
 3045:                                " associated with NIST-test-policy-3.  This user notice should "
 3046:                                "be displayed when  NIST-test-policy-1 is in the user-constrained-policy-set"
 3047:                               }}] == QSet;

 3049:     ct:log("QS ~p", [QSet]),

 3051:                               {visibleString, "q8:  This is the user notice from qualifier 8 "
 3052:                                "associated with anyPolicy.  This user notice should be displayed"
 3053:                                " when NIST-test-policy-2 is in the user-constrained-policy-set"
 3054:                           }}] == QSet;
